user_stories.user_story: As a professor, I must be able to create problems so students can have problems to do.

tasks.description: Create a structured Python project with a project management system. Python project should include instructions on: how to build the project, how to deploy the project, and how to add new dependencies to the project.

tasks.task: Ramp up on Python and study Python project structure
tasks.description: Ramp up on the basics of Python and understand the fundamentals. Also, study on how to use python management tools and how to use the pip command.

tasks.task: Create UI textbox for professors to input their question
tasks.description: Study Python's Tkinter and see how to create a textbox using Tkinter. Create a textbox in our Python application that allows input of a question.

tasks.task: Decide on which SQL to use for the back-end
tasks.description: Consider different databases and decide on the best database to use for our back-end. For example, you may want to research MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, etc

tasks.task: Design MySQL database schemas so professors can add questions to the database
tasks.description: Design the SQL Database schemas to support addition of questions for the professor. Be sure to make the table scalable and flexible.

tasks.task: Document the sprint by adding in the sprint backlog and burndown chart
tasks.description: Create new tab in front-end for `Sprint Backlogs`. Add the sprint back log with the user story for the sprint, the tasks that were broken down for the sprint, the estimated time it would take for each tasks, descriptions for each tasks, assignment of the tasks for each team member, and add a burndown chart.

Vethursan.task: Create UI textbox for professors to input their question

Bill.task: Decide on which SQL to use for the back-end
Design MySQL database schemas so professors can add questions to the database
dependencies: Decide on which SQL to use for the back-end (Bill)

Bill.task: Create UI textbox for professors to input their question (Assisting Vethursan)

Kevin.task: Update the documentation and add Sprint 0 backlog + Burndown chart.
